subtasks_completed: 1. Created src/lib/diff.ts module for diff analysis functions
2. Implemented getTouchedTracked(baseCommit): gets files from git diff --name-status
3. Implemented getTouchedUntracked(): gets new/modified untracked files from git status --porcelain
4. Implemented getDiffStats(baseCommit): gets lines added/deleted from git diff --numstat
5. Created DiffAnalysis interface with files_touched, lines_added, lines_deleted, new_files, touched_paths
